Api Package¶

The api package contains all the methods to load data into SDMXthon.

Read SDMX¶

api.api.read_sdmx(path_to_xml, path_to_metadata=None) → SDMXThon.model.message.Message¶

Read SDMX performs the operation of reading a SDMX Data and SDMX metadata files. URLs could be used.

Parameters

  • path_to_xml – Path or URL to the SDMX data file

  • path_to_metadata – Path or URL to the SDMX metadata file (Optional)

Returns

A Message object or a dict of Dataframes if path_to_metadata is None

Get Datasets¶

api.api.get_datasets(path_to_xml, path_to_metadata)¶

GetDatasets performs the operation of reading a SDMX Data and SDMX metadata files. URLs could be used.

Parameters

  • path_to_xml – Path or URL to the SDMX data file

  • path_to_metadata – Path or URL to the SDMX metadata file

Returns

A Dataset object or a dict of Datasets

Get Data¶

api.api.get_data(path_to_data)¶

GetData reads all observations in a SDMX file

Parameters

path_to_data – Path or URL to the SDMX data file

Returns

A Pandas Dataframe or a dict of Pandas Dataframe

XML To JSON¶

api.api.xml_to_json(pathToXML, path_to_metadata, output_path)¶

XML to JSON transforms a SDMX file into a JSON in the shape of the JSON Specification. Saves the file on disk.

Parameters

  • pathToXML – Path or URL to the SDMX data file

  • path_to_metadata – Path or URL to the SDMX metadata file

  • output_path – Path to save the JSON

XML To CSV¶

api.api.xml_to_csv(pathToXML, path_to_metadata, output_path)¶

XML to CSV transforms a SDMX file into a CSV. Saves the file on disk or .zip of CSV. If the SDMX data file has only a Dataset and output_path is ‘’, it returns a StringIO object.

Parameters

  • pathToXML – Path or URL to the SDMX data file

  • path_to_metadata – Path or URL to the SDMX metadata file

  • output_path – Path to save the CSV

Returns

A StringIO object if output_path is ‘’

Read JSON¶

api.api.read_json(path_to_json, dsds) → dict¶

Transforms a JSON file in the shape of the JSON Specification into a dict of Dataset.

Parameters

  • path_to_json – Path to the JSON file.

  • dsds – A dict of DataStructureDefinition

Returns

A dict of Datasets.

Validate Data¶

api.api.validate_data(datasets: Dict[str, SDMXThon.model.dataSet.DataSet])¶

Performs a semantic validation on each element of a dict of Dataset

Parameters

datasets – A dict of datasets.

Returns

A list of errors. See the Validation page
